name: Don't Drown (Papos)
description:
This game was made for the itch.io Mini Game Jam 106: Frogs

My first published game! Had fun making this, limitation of the jam was 'limited time'.

It's a simple casual endless runner, where the aim is to score the highest by surviving the longest on the lily pads. I am very aware of the lack of sound, it'll come soon!

Hold the spacebar to charge your leap, then let go to jump.

Hope you enjoy and thank you so much for taking the time to play.

Comments and feedback always welcome.

Big thanks to Zahran from the Mini Jam discord for helping me submit and guide me through the itch upload process!

(The ground is a lie!)
